data.title: Go Ahead and Go Inside
data.text: A co-worker and I needed a late lunch and wanted something authentic to Louisiana. We spotted this place on Yelp and decided to give it a try. From the outside, it doesn't look like much. We went inside and I ordered the fried shrimp Po boy with remoulade. It came wrapped in paper. It was delicious! The shrimp was crunchy, the pickles crisp and the remoulade was tasty.

data.title: Looking for Good Place that is YUMMY and AFFORDABLE.... you just found it.
data.text:
This place rocks when it comes to either dining in or grab and go.... like I did.  I had a garbage bag of 3 lbs of crawfish (mud bugs) 3 ears of corn, 5 potatoes and 2 sausage links.... drum roll...... $15.00  Boom.  That's it.
The bugs were tasty... seasoned real well.  Not too hot and not bland at all.
Yep... $3 a pound.  On the weekend they are $2.75  Are you kidding me???

Don't walk there ......RUN

data.title: Great crawfish
data.text: Looks live a dive but had tasty crawfish. I usually like them a little better when the are boiled fresh and hot but this place has them cooked ahead of time in a big cooler. They were still good but I can only imagine how great they would be if they were fresh. Great prices too!

data.title: Crazy Cajun Meal
data.text: Delicious spicy crawfish and shrimp. Try the pepper boudin balls. Crazy cheap. One pound of shrimp can feed three hungry people. Two pounds of crawfish for under six dollars.

data.title: Great Crawfish
data.text: I went there for lunch. It's not a nice restaurant to see, but their Crawfish is great. After I finished I ordered another pound because it was so good. I will definitely be going back and would recommend it to others. Great price too

data.title: Poor service
data.text:
Crawfish needed a bit more spice for me, but overall okay. Boudin balls very disappointing, looked burnt or as if fried in old oil. Tasted them & bad burnt flavor. Staff 
seemed a bit lost when we asked for dipping sauce for crawfish, 10 minutes later 1 small individual one was provided for 4 people in our group..requested more & 10 more minutes later received only 2 more! Will most likely  not be returning to dine here...

data.title: Try it!
data.text:
Wow!
Was kind of close to turn around when we saw the exterior, but boy am I glad we didn't! The boiled crawfish were amazing! Would recommend everyone to have them. Flavorful and fresh. Best I've ever had. The service was outstanding. Too bad u don't live closer to this place!

data.title: Lunch
data.text: Had the alligator po boy, so good makes me wonder what else I should try. REALLY pleased great staff,

data.title: Snow Crabs - The best we've ever had!
data.text: The snow crabs...to die for!  We go every weekend when possible!  The guys that own this place are super nice and local.

data.title: Wow!!!
data.text: An amazing place to get Cajun food! They have an amazing New Orleans style roast beef poboy that you need a roll of paper towels to get through. They make their own boudin balls that are tasty. An inspired "sweet tails" tops everything off. The "sweet tails" are crawfish tails battered with sweet potato batter. Everything is worth trying. Great prices served with heart!

data.title: "Exceptional Food, Exceptional Service
data.text: This place blew my socks off! Amazing food, extremely clean environment, and extra friendly and down to Earth staff!  I can't stop going back for the 'sweet tails' and the 'salmon candy!'  I love all of the unique culinary creations that Chef William Boutte provides in his Cajun restaurant!  This place is SOON to become a local favorite!!!  Also, I purchased a ton of different freezer meals to keep on hand for those chaotic nights when a home cooked meal just isn't happening; their freezer meals are homemade and DELICIOUS!! Absolute all-around family pleasures!!! Don't skip out on the boudin egg rolls!!!!!!  They make party trays too!! I actually just had my first Christmas party catered by them, & purchased these neat little oyster/seafood stainless steel cooking pieces to give to my family in California for Christmas!!!  I am in LOVE with this neat Cajun 'hole in the wall!!' If you haven't already, be sure to check it out!!!!!!

data.title: Fresh cajun eats!
data.text: My husband and I grabbed up a sampling of boudin balls, crawfish pie, and cracklins.  All were great!  The boudin balls were not very spicy (my preference is pretty hot) but good to the last bite.  My hubby fell in love with the crawfish pie.  The cracklins are seasoned with cajun spices and i couldn't stay out of the bag!  We will definitely go back again.  They also offer fresh Louisiana crawfish, gator and fish shipped to your home.  A must try for a decent sampling of cajun staples you can't find in restaurnts.
